termsSubtitle: An integrated online platform for event organization, ticketing, and AI-based face recognition check-in
acceptanceContent: By using the Veezy platform, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agreed to comply with these Terms of Use, as well as our Privacy Policy. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, you must not use our services.
definitionsContent:
Veezy: Refers to the online ticketing platform and associated services.
User: Any individual or entity that accesses or uses the Veezy platform.
Event Organizer: A user who creates and manages events on Veezy.
Attendee: A user who purchases tickets or registers for events through Veezy.
userRightsContent:
Users must provide accurate and complete information when creating an account.
Users are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of their account credentials.
Users agree not to use the platform for any illegal or unauthorized purpose.
Event Organizers are solely responsible for their events and compliance with applicable laws.
accountSecurityContent:
Users must immediately notify Veezy of any unauthorized use of their account.
Veezy reserves the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate these terms.
Users are responsible for all activities that occur under their account.
faceRecognitionContent:
Veezy uses AI-based face recognition for secure event check-in.
By using our services, you consent to the collection and processing of your facial data.
Facial data is processed in accordance with our Privacy Policy and is only used for verification purposes.
Users may opt-out of face recognition, but this may limit access to certain features.
disputeResolutionContent:
Any disputes arising from these terms shall be governed by the laws of Vietnam.
Parties agree to first attempt to resolve disputes through informal negotiations.
If resolution cannot be reached, disputes shall be submitted to the competent courts of Ho Chi Minh City.
footerNote: Your continued use of Veezy confirms that you have read, understood, and agreed to all contents of this Terms of Use agreement.
